name: Connect (itch) (Sc0rpiOn)
description:
Connect

Do you want to be on top?  Do you like to compete? Do you like to win? Well look no further, this game is for you!

Test your skill in the ultimate magnet stacking game! Drop the magnets perfectly to achieve a higher score. Employ the powers of magnetism,  attract the opposite poles and stack the magnet tower as high as you can!

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #18.

Sound assets from Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets

Leaderboards are done with LootLocker: https://www.lootlocker.io/

Controls:

Space / LMB - Drop the magnet

Esc - Pause / Exit
